title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4002.20 - Badge identification system
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4002.20 - Badge identification system

State Regulations

All licenses and participants shall comply with the
requirements of subdivision (b) of section
4003.50
of this Article and shall
be subject to the provisions of subdivision (h) of section
4003.50
of this Article for failure
to so comply. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4002.20

Amended

New

York State Register February 10, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 06, eff. 2/10/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
